movie.title: The Black Cannon Incident
movie.description_intro: Engineer Zhao Shuxin likes playing chess a lot. Once during his business trip, he loses a black cannon chessman which leads to unexpected consequences for him.
movie.description_full: Engineer Zhao Shuxin likes playing chess a lot. Once during his business trip, he loses a black cannon chessman which leads to unexpected consequences for him.

movies.title: The Tune
movies.summary: Del is a song writer for the obnoxious Mr. Mega, and in love with Didi, Mega's secretary. His quest to write a hit tune brings him to the wacky world of Flooby Nooby, where he just might learn to write songs from the heart.
movies.description_full: Del is a song writer for the obnoxious Mr. Mega, and in love with Didi, Mega's secretary. His quest to write a hit tune brings him to the wacky world of Flooby Nooby, where he just might learn to write songs from the heart.

movies.title: A Christmas Switch
movies.summary: When struggling singer Audrey and wealthy record executive Julia collide at the mall, they wake up in each other's lives the next morning. Audrey finds that, though Julia's life is full of luxury, she's missing the chance to connect with her family in any real way while Julia finds that, though she gets plenty of family time, Audrey can't say no to anyone giving her no time for herself. As Christmas looms closer, the two women rush to figure out how to both help each other and switch back before they miss Christmas morning with their own families.

movies.title: Raising Flagg
movies.summary: A comedy centered on a handyman (Arkin) and his lifelong competition with his neighbor (Pendleton.)
movies.description_full: A comedy centered on a handyman (Arkin) and his lifelong competition with his neighbor (Pendleton.)
movies.synopsis: A comedy centered on a handyman (Arkin) and his lifelong competition with his neighbor (Pendleton.)

movies.title: Toilet: A Love Story
movies.summary: Keshav and Jaya are from two villages near Mathura where at least 80% of households have no access to lavatories. Conflict comes knocking on the first day of their marriage, when Jaya discovers that Keshav's home has no toilet and she leaves. Distraught and desperate, Keshav embarks on a mission to win back his love by battling against the age-old traditions, mindset, and value system of his country.
